```{r}
committee_contributions <- committees %>%
  inner_join(contributions, by = "cmte_id")
head(committee_contributions)
```

```{r}
committee_contributions <- committee_contributions %>%
  select(cmte_id, cmte_name,transaction_type, name,transaction_dt, transaction_amt, cmte_party_affiliation)
head(committee_contributions)
```
